org.sat4j.specs

Interface SearchListener<S extends ISolverService>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConflictDepthTracing, ConflictLevelTracing, ConflictTracing, DecisionLevelTracing, DecisionTracing, DetailedCommandPanel, DotSearchTracing, HeuristicsTracing, LBDTracing, LearnedClauseSizeTracing, LearnedClausesSizeTracing, LearnedTracing, MultiTracing, SearchEnumeratorListener, SearchListenerAdapter, SearchMinOneListener, SearchOptimizerListener, SpeedTracing, TextOutputTracing

    public interface SearchListener<S extends ISolverService>
extends Serializable
    Interface to the solver main steps. Useful for integrating search visualization or debugging. (that class moved from org.sat4j.minisat.core in earlier version of SAT4J).
    Since:
    2.1
    Author:
    daniel
